titles.title: Pay Down the Debt Act
Pay Down the Debt Act
A bill to rescind amounts appropriated for grants that are not accepted by a State or local government and use the amounts for deficit reduction.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Appropriations.

bill.summary:
Pay Down the Debt Act
This bill rescinds appropriations that were provided for grants that were not accepted by a state or local government. The rescinded funds must be deposited in the Treasury and used for deficit reduction.
